website_summaries.verdict: Individuals may choose this Hi-Tec product as their primary day hiking pair for offering competent waterproofness and comfort. Its lightness and surface traction may also come in handy for those who frequent challenging environments.However, users express their disappointment over the footgear’s lack of breathability, especially when worn in warm environments. All in all, the Hi-Tec Altitude VI I WP may remain a reliable partner for outdoor adventures because of its strong characteristics, granted buyers use it in terrains with wet conditions or cool weather.
pros: Numerous Hi-Tec Altitude VI I WP reviews from verified customers state that it is a satisfyingly waterproof boot for hikers
Its lightness amazes a majority of outdoor enthusiasts
Countless trail lovers shower praises onto this Hi-Tec product for its comfort level
More than a bunch of shoppers commend the Altitude VI I WP’s grippy outsole
Some consumers mention that this footgear gives a lot of bang for the buck because of its reasonable price
A minority of users find its arch support to be excellent
cons: Several buyers comment that the Hi-Tec Altitude VI I WP is not breathable
A handful of wearers attest that its break-in period went longer than expected
A few purchasers detest the boot’s lack of cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these boots.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these boots. Spend the additional £20 or £30 for a good brand. You’ll save money in the long run. I only bought these a couple of months ago and when I received them, they did look the part. They fit well, we’re comfy and didn’t need a lot of breaking in. However, after only a couple of months the leather has cracked along the bottom lace line, The sole is starting to come away at the sides. Also along the crack you can see that the leather seems to be bonded and not full grain. The boots aren’t waterproof either, even after waxing and reproofing the tongue. See attached photos
customer_reviews.author: Scott Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Boots leaking after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: i bought these to replace the same model boot that i'd had for years. the old pair were great. these have been used for dog walking on grass only. my socks are soaked after a half hour walk. the leather uppers have an orange peel effect that others have complained about. such a shame my old ones were great. will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: fulloffish

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots but too small
customer_reviews.text: This was 4th pair of Hi-Tec boots I've had and until now always been satisfied. Previous pairs were all UK size 9 and fitted perfectly with a pair of woollen socks over sports socks. This pair also UK 9 was a very tight fit with no socks at all. Almost like manufacturer thinks the modern trend for not wearing socks with shoes also applies to walking boots 😀. Suffice to say will be returning and ordering a size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t love these boots anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Had these boots 18 months now and was really delighted with them when I purchased them, most comfortable boots I’d ever owned and proved to be as stated, waterproof. Look at them now! Big hole running down the seam of boot where stitching has given way, i’d say that’s poor for boots that haven’t exactly had a hard life and are only 18 months old
customer_reviews.author: MARK A SLACK

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Had boots 2 days and outer coating on boots started to peel off very poor quality, had these boots before and they were brilliant but quality has been lost.
customer_reviews.author: christopher/Irene

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best hiking boots!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, warm and waterproof boots, ideal for hiking in the harsh environment, whether it's a boggy moor or rocky mountain path!
customer_reviews.author: rmx

customer_reviews.title: Beware of sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking boot for the price but unfortunately too small by far. Would recommend at least one size up and also a good look at listed reviews.
customer_reviews.author: DEREK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with with these boots, after having a previous pair of hi-tech boots last 2 years i bought these and both boots have split after just 5 months, the leather looked poor from new , they are comfortable but just poorly made!! Dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Liked the snug fit. Not too wide. Look smart enough and like the all leather finish
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered late February 2020. Used 6 times. Now leather peeling off not waterproof. Little used due to lockdown
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot and very comfy straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: RKEM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots and good value!
customer_reviews.text: Be mindful that you might need one size larger than usual, to accommodate thicker socks?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and waterproof boots
customer_reviews.text: These hitec boots are very comfortable. I haven't worn them for long walks yet but I've taken them out in some super saturated fields and I can confirm they are definitely fully waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Whilst I would have been happy with the boot, it was too narrow
customer_reviews.author: Mr R W

customer_reviews.title: Leather
customer_reviews.text: To everyone complaining about the leather... Try polishing or moisturising it occasionally. You have to actually look after leather boots - whatever the brand or price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carruthers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As good as the last hi tec boots my husband bought.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kendall

product_meta.title: Hi-Tec Men's Altitude Vi I Waterproof High Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: The newest addition to the altitude range, the altitude vi waterproof. Packed with technology, these boots feature a premium leather upper and dri-tec waterproof membrane to keep feet dry. Our exclusive i-shield technology repels water and dirt, and the micro-fleece lining keeps feet comfortable. With an ortholite impressions insole, with slow recovery foam, to promote long lasting under foot cushioning. The high performance michelin rubber outsole delivers superior traction and durability.
feature_bullets: Dri-Tec - Fully waterproof and breathable membrane.
Premium Leather - Superbly hard wearing, flexible and lightweight fabric.
i-Shield - An invisible, protective layer which is waterproof, breathable and stain-resistant.
Traditional Lacing System - Quick and easily adjustable fastening.
Rust-Proof Eyelets - Allowing the eyelets and lacing system to stay in great conditions.
